Commercial Door Hardware Supply & Installation

Direct vendor pricing on exit devices, locksets, door closers, and specialty hardware for commercial projects

Professional Hardware for Commercial Applications

Commercial buildings, hotels, and institutional facilities require hardware that meets fire codes, ADA compliance, and heavy-use durability standards. Our direct vendor relationships with Allegion and other leading manufacturers ensure you get the right products at competitive prices with expert installation.

Product Categories

Exit Devices & Panic Hardware

Code-compliant emergency egress solutions

  • Rim exit devices for high-traffic areas
  • Mortise exit devices for heavy-duty applications
  • Vertical rod devices for double doors
  • Fire-rated and delayed egress options

Commercial Locksets

Heavy-duty locks for commercial applications

  • Mortise locksets for maximum security
  • Cylindrical locks for standard applications
  • Electronic locks with access control integration
  • Master key systems and key coordination

Door Closers & Operators

Automatic door control for accessibility and energy efficiency

  • Surface-mounted closers for standard applications
  • Concealed closers for aesthetic requirements
  • Automatic operators for ADA compliance
  • Hold-open devices with fire release

Specialty Hardware

Complete door solutions for unique requirements

  • Heavy-duty hinges and pivots
  • Weatherstripping and seals
  • Door stops and holders
  • Custom finishes and specifications
